console.texto: I have a degree in Systems Analysis and Development from Fatene since 2017 and specialized in Fullstack programming from Labenu. Since 2021, I have been building REST APIs in the Backend with a focus on Node.JS, TypeScript, Express.JS, Nest.JS and PostgreSQL. I also build interfaces using React.JS on Frontend. In addition to technical skills, I have excellent team collaboration and clear communication skills. Throughout my academic training and practical experience, I developed robust skills in web development, actively participated in projects that improved the user experience, prioritizing cleaner and more efficient interfaces. I am enthusiastic about driving challenging projects.

projetos.descCard1: An application that accurately calculates the amount that must be charged on the Mercado Pago machine, if the customer wants to pay in installments for a purchase on credit.
projetos.descCard2: An application that receives a .XLSX spreadsheet file from the user and, using the data in the file, generates dynamic graphs of monthly metrics.
projetos.tituloCard3: Backend application for publishing and consulting job vacancies.
projetos.descCard3: A Backend application for a job vacancy website. It was a challenging project that made me learn more about AWS Cloud and integrated use of A.I.
projetos.tituloCard4: Commercial website with quote generating application.
projetos.descCard4: A website for a family member's business with a section that receives user data and generates a PDF of a dynamic quote. Only an authenticated user can generate the quote.
projetos.descCard5: An inventory management system for a friend's company. With PostgreSQL database, NodeJS and ReactJS on the Frontend. It's under construction right now.

trabalhos.detalheCard1: I studied Systems Analysis and Development at the Faculty of Technology of the Northeast (Fatene).
trabalhos.detalheCard3: I worked at Hapvida Notre Dame. I was responsible for the implementation, maintenance and continuous improvement of custom systems and applications. I offer specialized technical support, meeting users' needs and collaborate closely with the development team to create effective solutions.
trabalhos.detalheCard4: I worked at Ame Digital, a company in the Americanas group (B2W). I collaborate closely with the development team to optimize API functionalities, ensuring a seamless experience for users.
trabalhos.detalheCard5: I work as a Freelance Fullstack Web Programmer building APIs with NodeJS and Frontend in ReactJS.

hardskills.javascript: I Use with TypeScript and Node JS to create powerful Backend tools..
hardskills.TypeScript: It helps me a lot to create Web applications (especially in the Backend), I love this superset.
hardskills.git: Use for everything that is most essential for a Programmer (code versioning, etc.)
hardskills.react: The Frontend building tool that I master and prefer to use. This page was made with ReactJS.
hardskills.mysql: The world's most popular open source database
hardskills.PostgreSQL: The database I use most and prefer for personal projects
hardskills.nodejs: It's my 'strong point' at the moment, the main technology I use in web applications.
hardskills.express: It was the first web application framework with which I did something really meaningful.
hardskills.heroku: I've already created applications on both the Backend and Frontend to run on Heroku, too bad it's now paid ðŸ˜¢.
hardskills.docker: I have solid knowledge in programming in Microservices, creating and maintaining applications in Containers
hardskills.aws: I continue to learn about AWS, I will soon have the 'AWS Developer Associate' Certification
hardskills.gcp: I got hands-on experience in my last role.
hardskills.nest: More practical to build than ExpressJS. I'm loving NestJS too!
